de:
PLAZA MADELEINE Hôtel & Spa is a prestigious four-star establishment located at the heart of Sarlat.
The hotel is ideally situated at the heart of the town, offering direct access to the medieval city with its listed monuments, shops, restaurants, live entertainment, street performances, and much more.

PLAZA MADELEINE Hôtel & Spa offers you the privilege of luxuriating in a well-being space at the centre of town, including a heated swimming pool (open from Easter to All Saints' Day), as well as a sauna, steam bath, jacuzzi, sun terrace, and more.
The entire establishment is air-conditioned and offers free high-speed Wi-Fi access. The hotel also offers an enclosed parking garage.
en:
PLAZA MADELEINE Hôtel & Spa is a prestigious four-star establishment located at the heart of Sarlat.

The hotel is ideally situated at the heart of the town, offering direct access to the medieval city with its listed monuments, shops, restaurants, live entertainment, street performances, and much more.

PLAZA MADELEINE Hôtel & Spa offers you the privilege of luxuriating in a well-being space at the centre of town, including a heated swimming pool (open from Easter to All Saints' Day), as well as a sauna, steam bath, jacuzzi, sun terrace, and more.
The entire establishment is air-conditioned and offers free high-speed Wi-Fi access. The hotel also offers an enclosed parking garage.
it:
Hotel di prestigio nel cuore di Sarlat.

L'Hotel & Spa PLAZA MADELEINE, da sempre considerato l'istituzione alberghiera di Sarlat, è un'autentica struttura a 4 stelle situata nel centro della città vecchia.

L'hotel è situato in posizione ideale all'ingresso della città medievale con i suoi monumenti tutelati, i suoi mercati e negozi, i suoi numerosi ristoranti, le sue animazioni di strada e i suoi spettacoli.

Soggiornare al PLAZA MADELEINE Hotel & Spa significa anche avere il privilegio di avere a disposizione una piscina riscaldata con terrazza e solarium, un'area benessere con sauna, hammam, jacuzzi, doccia tematica?

L'hotel è completamente climatizzato e dispone di connessione Wi-Fi ad alta velocità gratuita. L'hotel offre anche un garage chiuso e i migliori servizi per soddisfare le esigenze degli ospiti internazionali.
fr:
Hôtel de prestige au cœur de Sarlat.

PLAZA MADELEINE Hôtel & Spa, considéré depuis toujours comme l’institution hôtelière à Sarlat est un authentique établissement 4 étoiles situé au centre de la vieille ville.

L’hôtel est idéalement situé à l’entrée de la cité médiévale avec ses monuments classés, ses marchés et commerces, ses nombreux restaurants, ses animations de rues et ses spectacles.

Séjourner au PLAZA MADELEINE Hôtel & Spa c’est aussi le privilège de disposer en plein cœur de la ville d’une piscine chauffée avec terrasse et solarium, d’un espace bien-être avec sauna, hammam, jacuzzi, douche à thème…

L’établissement est totalement climatisé et dispose d’un accès Wifi gratuit haut débit. L’hôtel propose également un garage fermé et les meilleurs équipements pour répondre aux critères d’exigences de la clientèle internationale.

The hotel is ideally situated at the heart of the town, offering direct access to the medieval city with its listed monuments, shops, restaurants, live entertainment, street performances, and much more.

PLAZA MADELEINE Hôtel & Spa offers you the privilege of luxuriating in a well-being space at the centre of town, including a heated swimming pool (open from Easter to All Saints' Day), as well as a sauna, steam bath, jacuzzi, sun terrace, and more.
The entire establishment is air-conditioned and offers free high-speed Wi-Fi access. The hotel also offers an enclosed parking garage.
es:
PLAZA MADELEINE Hôtel & Spa is a prestigious four-star establishment located at the heart of Sarlat.
The hotel is ideally situated at the heart of the town, offering direct access to the medieval city with its listed monuments, shops, restaurants, live entertainment, street performances, and much more.

PLAZA MADELEINE Hôtel & Spa offers you the privilege of luxuriating in a well-being space at the centre of town, including a heated swimming pool (open from Easter to All Saints' Day), as well as a sauna, steam bath, jacuzzi, sun terrace, and more.
The entire establishment is air-conditioned and offers free high-speed Wi-Fi access. The hotel also offers an enclosed parking garage.

hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de Tourisme Sarlat Périgord Noir

de: Collecter, mettre en commun et diffuser le plus largement possible une information complète et de qualité au service de nos habitants et de nos visiteurs : voici les objectifs du SIRTAQUI, Système d’Information Régional Touristique de Nouvelle-AQUItaine. Le dispositif est mis en œuvre conjointement par le Comité Régional de Tourisme de Nouvelle-Aquitaine, les services touristiques de la Corrèze, de la Creuse, de la Dordogne, de la Gironde, des Landes, du Lot-et-Garonne, des Pyrénées-Atlantiques, des Deux-Sèvres, de la Vienne et de la Haute-Vienne, en collaboration avec les Offices de Tourisme, et avec le soutien financier de l’Europe et du Conseil Régional.
en: Collecter, mettre en commun et diffuser le plus largement possible une information complète et de qualité au service de nos habitants et de nos visiteurs : voici les objectifs du SIRTAQUI, Système d’Information Régional Touristique de Nouvelle-AQUItaine. Le dispositif est mis en œuvre conjointement par le Comité Régional de Tourisme de Nouvelle-Aquitaine, les services touristiques de la Corrèze, de la Creuse, de la Dordogne, de la Gironde, des Landes, du Lot-et-Garonne, des Pyrénées-Atlantiques, des Deux-Sèvres, de la Vienne et de la Haute-Vienne, en collaboration avec les Offices de Tourisme, et avec le soutien financier de l’Europe et du Conseil Régional.
